title: Brazil decries “green protectionism”
description:
Tatiana Prazeres, foreign trade secretary at Brazil’s Industry and Trade Ministry, said in an interview published Wednesday that “many countries are actually using the sustainability agenda to promote their protectionist interests” — adding that Brazil will use its G20 presidency to fight “green protectionism.” The issue will be discussed at next week’s G20 ministerial meeting in […]

The post Brazil decries “green protectionism” appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
